description: Guides AI agents through creating a new task module from templates under the execution contract.
body:
You are an AI engineering assistant.
1. Read ai/AI_TASK_MONITOR_CONTRACT.md and ai/TO-DO.md.
2. Decide whether to instantiate a new task or update existing files.
3. Use ai/tasks/templates as the canonical source for task module structures.
4. Ensure all Markdown begins with a Machine Summary Block before committing.

summary.purpose: Provides a ready-to-validate prompt configuration for generating new AI task modules.
